title: Panic in libtest while running doc tests

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-doctests
labels.description: Area: Documentation tests, run by rustdoc

body:
Encountered while updating https://github.com/lumen/lumen from `nightly-2020-05-13` to latest `nightly` (`nightly-2020-01-29`) I haven't minimized yet this. Posting now to minimize later. ### Code 1. `git checkout git@github.com:lumen/lumen.git` 2. `git checkout 614cd157dfa302e8235c0957b6fe0b5b8f59332e` 3. `cargo make test -- --package liblumen_alloc` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (c0b64d97b 2021-01-28) binary: rustc commit-hash: c0b64d97beebb09325b5587abed39f4f1621026f commit-date: 2021-01-28 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` running 9 tests test src/erts/process/alloc/iter.rs - erts::process::alloc::iter::HeapIter::iter_mut (line 18) ... ignored test src/erts/process/trace/utils.rs - erts::process::trace::utils::calculate_fragment_layout (line 159) ... ignored test src/erts/term/binary/primitives.rs - erts::term::binary::primitives::is_bit_set (line 41) ... ignored test src/erts/term/binary/primitives.rs - erts::term::binary::primitives::make_bitmask (line 10) ... ignored test src/erts/term/binary/primitives.rs - erts::term::binary::primitives::mask_bits (line 25) ... ignored test src/lib.rs - SysAlloc (line 58) ... ignored thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', library/test/src/lib.rs:356:75 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (c0b64d97b 2021-01-28) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no --crate-type lib query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', library/test/src/lib.rs:356:75 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::panicking::panic 3: test::run_tests 4: test::console::run_tests_console 5: test::test_main 6: rustdoc::doctest::run 7: rustdoc::main_options 8: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```

The panicked line is trying to remove the completed test https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/0e63af5da3400ace48a0345117980473fd21ad73/library/test/src/lib.rs#L356 ``` est stats::histogram::tests::histogram_from_ranges_test ... ok test result: ok. 77 passed; 0 failed; 4 ignored; 0 measured; 0 filtered out; finished in 0.01s Doc-tests liblumen_alloc running 9 tests test src/erts/process/alloc/iter.rs - erts::process::alloc::iter::HeapIter::iter_mut (line 18) ... ignored test src/erts/process/trace/utils.rs - erts::process::trace::utils::calculate_fragment_layout (line 159) ... ignored test src/erts/term/binary/primitives.rs - erts::term::binary::primitives::is_bit_set (line 41) ... ignored test src/erts/term/binary/primitives.rs - erts::term::binary::primitives::make_bitmask (line 10) ... ignored test src/erts/term/binary/primitives.rs - erts::term::binary::primitives::mask_bits (line 25) ... ignored test src/lib.rs - SysAlloc (line 58) ... ignored ``` The normal unit tests are passing fine, so this is when the doctest section is being printed so it is either a problem during the doctest or immediately after
